title: Champ Insights: Camille, the Steel Shadow

replies.body: So I get to play as the villain from Kingsman movie.
logged in just to upvote
This is Lin Beifong!! even uses the same wire ability <3 cant wait
i stated that exact same thing a while ago

I love her design, but it still feels distant to older designs.
I've found it difficult to connect to recent champions. 
Camille is a step in the right direction thematically, but her kit pushes me away as a less annoying Yasuo.
Lin isn't from the last airbender. Im almost certain you just wrote this because you saw a meme about it, but didnt really watch either of the shows
I didn't mention anything about The Last Airbender
what?

From what I can gather, the RIOT staff in particular are heading in a new artistic direction that is much closer to how they wanted the game to look in the first place. Either that or a new employee influenced the design in character. Unfortunately, new art styles often class with older ones, hence the distance you may be feeling. </3 I like both styles but I'm torn as well.
